scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup-client && npm run setup-server && npm run setup-database
scripts.setup-database: mongod --fork --syslog --dbpath ~/data/db --bind_ip 127.0.0.1 --port 27017 && mongo retirement --eval "db.funds.drop()" && mongo retirement --eval "db.accounts.drop()" && mongoimport --db retirement --collection funds --file "server/src/data/funds.json" --jsonArray && mongoimport --db retirement --collection accounts --file "server/src/data/accounts.json" --jsonArray && mongo admin --eval "db.shutdownServer()"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run database" "npm run server" "npm run client" --kill-others-on-fail
